::Spears:;
She smirked at him.  She walked up to him with a smile on her 
face.  "Well, it looks good on you too, you know."  She did a leg 
sweep, to knock him down and tried to tackle him, her intention was 
to roll hihm in the soot a bit.  She was laughing the whole time. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Hearing Spears scream, Striker runs to the computer room, entering 
to see her 
> covered with ash and soot again. He grins, chuckling.
> 
> "You really like that outfit, don't you?" he asks, ready to jump 
out of the 
> way in case she came at him.
